message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a method for generating labeled training data for event cameras using existing labeled data for images. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper focuses on object detection and 2D human pose estimation, which are related to robotics (cs.RO). The paper also uses deep learning techniques, such as convolutional neural networks and adversarial training, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the modeling of event noise, which is related to neural networks (cs.NE).
